title: A Certain Someone - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Romance   School Life   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Absent Parents   Adapted to Drama CD   Age Progression   Charming Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cohabitation   Coming of Age   Complex Family Relationships   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Family   Family Conflict   First Love   Friendship   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Jealousy   Loneliness   Long Separations   Lovers Reunited   Modern Day   Past Trauma   Playful Protagonist   Popular Love Interests   Rivalry   Single Parent   Slow Romance   Smart Couple   Time Skip   Tragic Past

description:
Sheng Wang moved into his ancestral home at White Horse Lane, along with the woman that his father was presently seeing.

His dad pointed at that woman’s son and said to him: Call him ge (older brother).

Unyielding, amenable to coaxing but not coercion cold generator Gong x Regards himself as something precious lazy young master Shou

Sheng Wang: I’m super straight

Jiang Tian: I’m homophobic>
